name: 霍弘毅
objective: 本課程以當代文學批評和文化理論為基礎，探討小說與戲劇改編成電影的過程中，文字轉化成視覺意象之間的差異，期能提升多元化的思辯及表達能力。
schedule: In this course we will learn about the process of making movies by making a movie. This year the genre will be MUSICAL COMEDY. From inception, to script, to locations, to lighting and sound, to acting, to editing, to shooting, to splicing together the final product- all will be done by students under my general direction.
scorePolicy: Grading will have to based on participation. The more you participate in and contribute to the movie, the better- no matter what you specialty (script, acting, shooting, et cetera.
materials: I need your enthusiasm because making a film is complicated and involves a lot of problem-solving.
